Fix1.Name: Install Microsoft Office
Fix1.Description: Installs Microsoft Office suite on the system.

Fix2.Name: Clear Temporary Files
Fix2.Description: Removes temporary files from the system to free up space.

Fix3.Name: Reboot the System
Fix3.Description: Reboots the system for updates or troubleshooting.

Fix4.Name: Clear Browser Cache
Fix4.Description: Clears cache for the default browser.

Fix5.Name: Uninstall Unwanted Program
Fix5.Description: Uninstalls a specified program from the system.
